name: Inductor
description:
Inductor is a sci-fi puzzle first-person shooter with the elements of a car simulator. The action revolves around the dangerous journey of the main character. Only a few decades have passed since the Third World War, and a new threat looms over the world. You play as Kira, one of the few survivors, and your task is to save the world from an awakened evil. Embark on a dangerous journey full of mystery and action.

OVERCOME PUZZLES


You have to overcome puzzles throughout your journey to move towards your goal. Defeat enemies with weapons and cunning.

STEP ON THE GAS


You are driving a powerful tractor unit. Drive safe, there is a nuclear bomb on the trailer.

EXPLORE THE OPEN WORLD


A large post-apocalyptic world is full of mystery and danger.
You will find rusted robots, multi-ton turrets, abandoned bunkers, and secret laboratories.

FEATURES


  • A unique blend of car simulator and puzzle shooter
  • Large post-apocalyptic open world
  • Next-generation graphics
  • Dynamic weather change and day/night cycle
